title: Sin & Secret
description:
The story of a brave young exorcist in 19th century rural America that takes upon herself to chase the Devil out of her twisted little brother. A heartwarming tale of love and devotion to family.

Drawn by Kyaradain :
[url=https://www.pixiv.net/en/users/2054135][img]https://i.imgur.com/oiVINmy.png[/img] Artist’s Pixiv[/url]
[url=https://twitter.com/kyaradain][img]https://i.imgur.com/dQCXZkU.png[/img] Artist’s Twitter[/url]

Translation by me, Dorofinu :
[url=https://twitter.com/dorofinu][img]https://i.imgur.com/dQCXZkU.png[/img] Translator’s Twitter[/url]

This is an official translation done with the blessing of the author!
On top of that, he expressed the wish for it to be distributed for free. Please support him if you can, that's cool of him!

matches.title: They’re All Little and They’re All Sluts!
